txt.en: The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothl√≥rien.

'There are many foul Orcs at Nardur-stazg, and many of their most powerful champions. This encampment serves as the chief stronghold of Mazog's Orcs in Fanuidhol, and it would strike a blow to their collective spirit if it were put to shame.

'I would have you enter Nardur-stazg and burn their banner. To have their standard put to the torch will enrage them, but it will also cause them some pause. You may perhaps encounter the champion of Nardur-stazg...if so, defeat him as well.

'Nardur-stazg lies well to the north-west of here. Return to me when the deed is done.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

Nardur-stazg lies to the north-west from Talan Gwilith.

Raingon has asked you to burn the Orc-banner at Nardur-stazg and defeat the camp's champion.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>
'You have laid low the champion of Nardur-stazg and brought shame to the Orcs of Moria? I am well-pleased, [placeholder].'

Raingon is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Nardur-stazg.

You should return to Raingon with the tidings of your victory at Nardur-stazg.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

'Head north-west to Nardur-stazg and deal with the enemy there.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>
Burn banner at Nardur-stazg and defeat Narash
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
